name: Across the Lands
description:
The King has been killed, and you, his daughter, must flee from a coup, and travel throught the lowlands toward the north. 

This is a game of gestion where you must manage the different ressources in your army in order for it to survive. You must reach or face the different events and battles, and find ways to supply your troups to avoid desertions.

I made this game in 6 days for the 254th Weekly Game Jam. Except for a few sounds effects, I made everything myself. I used Unity, Aseprite for the graphic part, and FL Studio for the music.

If you have any problem with the game, if you are curious about an aspect of it or if you just want to leave a feedback, don't hesitate to write me a little comment! :)
